title: Educational Technology Leadership Strategies for Web-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Leadership competency enhancement for corporate elementary education program administrators

learning_goals: Learners can explain three practical strategies for demonstrating innovative leadership in web-based instructional design.
Learners can collaboratively design nonlinear utilization strategies for digital tools with team members
Learners can execute a change management process in educational technology environments, distinguishing at least two stages
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
